body:
The Upstairs Neighbor 4

—————————————————————

We finish our food and Jimin offers to clean the dishes AND my kitchen. We sit in the living room and watch the best Kdrama ever!!! Black [Yall should like watch that drama! It’s awesome, the president of the insurance company is CUTE! I called him Mr Sexy President because that’s what he is.]

“Omg look Minnie it’s Mr. Sexy President!” I shake his shoulders

“He’s not even that good looking.” Jimin rolls his eyes, I sense a little jealousy in voice “I’m way better looking than him.”

I look at him “Is someone jealous?” I smirk

“Hmm, you can wipe the cute smirk off your face miss Jenni.” A smirk also on his face 

“Haha, whatever you say Mr Park.” i wink 

“Your pushing it Jenni.” He moves closer to me “Remember what Hyunjin said. No funny business.”

“Hmm, then someone is sitting a little to close then.” I lean my head on his shoulder “But I’m sure that Hyunjin won’t mind.”

We stay like that until the episode was over, the next episode was about to start when my phone started ringing. 

“Hello Hyunjin, how’s the get together?” I ask

“It’s pretty fun. We’re hangin with Got7 and Day6 right now.” He sounds a little annoyed i think

“Hyunjin, what’s wrong?”

“It’s Twice, they won’t leave Jeongin, Han and Felix alone.”He lets out a frustrated grunt “Its freaking annoying.”

“Where are they?” 

“Right here. Literally Got7 and Day6 are like our bodyguards, they shoo them away. Oh, Han wants to talk.”

“Hi Noona I miss you!” Han’s voice is loud and cheery “Are you having fun with Jimin?”

“I miss you too Han love.” I smile “Yes I am having fun Han. Are you having fun?”

“Well, kind of.” His voice quiets down “The girls in Twice won’t go away. They keep trying to flirt with us. It’s a little creepy.”

“Where’s Bang Chan?” I ask 

“Uhh, talking with JYP hyung.” Here’s a small pause “Can you and Jimin hyung come? Maybe they’ll go away if you’re here.”

“No you stay there Jenni!” I can here Hyunjin in the background “Well actually, can you? I want to go mingle with people and I can’t because these pesky twigs want to flirt.”

“Hyunjin!” Me and Jimin start laughing “I’ll be there shortly okay. Bye.”

“He’s something isn’t he?”

“Yeah, would you want to come?” I turn my body to face him 

“Of course.” He stands up “I’ll drive us.”

—————————————————At JYP—

When we arrive, the receptionist tells us it’s in the cafeteria. As we move closer, we can hear the music and people talking down the hall. The cafeteria isn’t max full but there’s a lot of people. I glance around the room and spot Jackson’s white hair. We maneuver through the crowd until Jeongin spots us and runs up.

“You came!”

“Of course i did.” I smiled “Hello everyone! How’s the night?”

“It was going great until Twice kept bothering them.” Bam Bam looked overly annoyed “They just kept coming. One would get sent away and another would come in her place.”

“Well, I’m here now. Hopefully they’ll leave you alone.” I sigh and sit next to JB “So meet any new trainees?”

“Yeah, there’s a lot of them here actually. The only actual groups here are Us, DAY6 and Twice.” Jinyoung says “JYP probably just wanted some familiar faces around.”

The group disburst some leaving me, Jimin, Jeongin, Seungmin and Han at the table. Jeongin, Seungmin and Han eventually left when they played ‘If You Do’ by Got7, they long with Got7 did a couple of there dances for the crowd. 

“I knew we’d eventually end up coming.” Jimin pulls me into his lap “Your such a perfect mom to them.”

“Well, it is my job basically.” I smile “They’re all like my children and it’s my job to protect them.” We say like that and talk until i feel someone watching me. I look around and see Jihyo and Tzuyu giving me the dirtiest of looks. [The hell’s wrong with them.] I bring my attention back to Jimin and run my hands through his hair. 

The night goes on really well, me and Jimin stand up and walk around. Fans of BTS saw Jimin and wanted a picture and to talk. I left him to do that and walked around myself until I saw Seungmin and Han over by the food. They were joking with each other until Dahyun and Chaeyoung walked up to them. I stayed back a little just to see what they’s do. The girls were talking and what not, the boys seemed to not mind but Chaeyoung got a little too close to Seungmin for mine and his liking. 

“Oh hello Dahyun and Chaeyoung.” I walk over and smile “How’s your night?”

“It’s fine.” Dahyun answers “I didn’t know you’d come as well?”

“I was invited here by JYP since I take care of these lovely boys of mine.” I look at Seungmin and Han “Are they bothering you?”

“Yes,” I’ve never seen Han look anything but happy and to see him look irritated made me sad “I just wanted something to drink and here they come. Don’t you two have something to do other than bother us all night? Make you look desperate.”

I had to hold back my laughter “You heard him, walk away.”

Dahyun gives me an apologetic look before dragging a red Chaeyoung away, “Han omg where did that come from?”

He shrugs “I think I’ve been hanging with Hyunjin to much. Was I a little too harsh?”

“No baby, that was perfect.” I hug him and Seungmin “I’m going to go find the rest.”

The others were on the dance floor, except for Hyunjin who walked off the same floor to sit down. As I made my way, someone grabbed my arm… it was just Jimin.

“You scared me.” I hug him “Sorry for wondering off.”

“Don’t be sorry,” he slowly rocks me to the beat of the music “I should be sorry for letting them take my attention away from you. Did you manage to find all the boys?”

“Yeah, they’re all out dancing now.” I look back at Hyunjin who’s on his phone “I was going to go talk with Hyunjin.”

We held hands and walked off the dance floor, that’s when Tzuyu(?) sat next to him. [please control yourself] I slowed our pace a little to watch what happens. She was literally all over him, clearly he was annoyed to the max but I couldn’t but in just yet. I know he can handle himself, but I’m not sure if I can handle what I’m feeling. I lost it when she grabbed his face, I let Jimin’s hand go and stomped over.

I knocked her hand off his face and she stood up “What do you think your doing!”

“Ugh why is your mother here.” Her voice full of sass “Go away grandma, I’m busy.”

“Don’t you dare touch him again!” I got in between them “You and your group have been bothering my boys all night and I’m sick of it. Just like Han said you are all desperate!”

“Really, says the one who was all in Jimin Oppas lap earlier.” She crosses her arms “If that’s not desperate then I don’t know what is.”

“C-Come on Noona!” Hyunjin held my hand “They aren’t worth it. Me and Jimin will gather everyone, go sit in the car yah.”

I took a deep breath and agreed, I told their manager that their leaving and to have the car ready. I went to go sit in Jimin’s car, still fuming. Moments later, Jimin brought Jeongin and Hyunjin to the car. He opened my door and pulled me into a hug.

“She’s right..right?” I whisper

“Right about what?”

“Me being.. d-desperate?”

He pulls away and looks me in the eyes “No, she was mad because you protected your brother.”

“Yeah don’t listen to that she devil.” Hyunjin says from in the car

“Let’s get them home.”

We drive home in silence, everyone waited for us to get out of his car and to our floor. Me and Jimin hug once more before he disappeared into in apartment. They boys and I walked up the stairs, I bid everyone a goodnight and went straight to my room. Flopped on my bed. [Desprate…me? No…never!] my phone pings and it’s Jimin.

MochiBooty❤️: I know your thinking what Tzuyu said but your far from desprate. Your an amazing woman and I’m super happy I’ve gotten to know you. If anything I’m desprate for your attention💕 we should hang out again tomorrow when the boys go to practice, we have the day off. Only if you don’t mind.

MochiBooty❤️: Have a wonder slumber. Goodnight beautiful💕💕💕

[who said he could be this cute!]

Me: I would love to hang out tomorrow! Let’s talk more tomorrow ya…goodnight Minnie💕

I undress into my PJs and slip into a wondrous slumber.

When we arrive, the receptionist tells us it’s in the cafeteria. As we move closer, we can hear the music and people talking down the hall. The cafeteria isn’t max full but there’s a lot of people. I glance around the room and spot Jackson’s white hair. We maneuver through the crowd until Jeongin spots us and runs up.

“You came!”

“Of course i did.” I smiled “Hello everyone! How’s the night?”

“It was going great until Twice kept bothering them.” Bam Bam looked overly annoyed “They just kept coming. One would get sent away and another would come in her place.”

“Well, I’m here now. Hopefully they’ll leave you alone.” I sigh and sit next to JB “So meet any new trainees?”

“Yeah, there’s a lot of them here actually. The only actual groups here are Us, DAY6 and Twice.” Jinyoung says “JYP probably just wanted some familiar faces around.”

The group disburst some leaving me, Jimin, Jeongin, Seungmin and Han at the table. Jeongin, Seungmin and Han eventually left when they played ‘If You Do’ by Got7, they long with Got7 did a couple of there dances for the crowd. 

“I knew we’d eventually end up coming.” Jimin pulls me into his lap “Your such a perfect mom to them.”

“Well, it is my job basically.” I smile “They’re all like my children and it’s my job to protect them.” We say like that and talk until i feel someone watching me. I look around and see Jihyo and Tzuyu giving me the dirtiest of looks. [The hell’s wrong with them.] I bring my attention back to Jimin and run my hands through his hair. 

The night goes on really well, me and Jimin stand up and walk around. Fans of BTS saw Jimin and wanted a picture and to talk. I left him to do that and walked around myself until I saw Seungmin and Han over by the food. They were joking with each other until Dahyun and Chaeyoung walked up to them. I stayed back a little just to see what they’s do. The girls were talking and what not, the boys seemed to not mind but Chaeyoung got a little too close to Seungmin for mine and his liking. 

“Oh hello Dahyun and Chaeyoung.” I walk over and smile “How’s your night?”

“It’s fine.” Dahyun answers “I didn’t know you’d come as well?”

“I was invited here by JYP since I take care of these lovely boys of mine.” I look at Seungmin and Han “Are they bothering you?”

“Yes,” I’ve never seen Han look anything but happy and to see him look irritated made me sad “I just wanted something to drink and here they come. Don’t you two have something to do other than bother us all night? Make you look desperate.”

I had to hold back my laughter “You heard him, walk away.”

Dahyun gives me an apologetic look before dragging a red Chaeyoung away, “Han omg where did that come from?”

He shrugs “I think I’ve been hanging with Hyunjin to much. Was I a little too harsh?”

“No baby, that was perfect.” I hug him and Seungmin “I’m going to go find the rest.”

The others were on the dance floor, except for Hyunjin who walked off the same floor to sit down. As I made my way, someone grabbed my arm… it was just Jimin.

“You scared me.” I hug him “Sorry for wondering off.”

“Don’t be sorry,” he slowly rocks me to the beat of the music “I should be sorry for letting them take my attention away from you. Did you manage to find all the boys?”

“Yeah, they’re all out dancing now.” I look back at Hyunjin who’s on his phone “I was going to go talk with Hyunjin.”

We held hands and walked off the dance floor, that’s when Tzuyu(?) sat next to him. [please control yourself] I slowed our pace a little to watch what happens. She was literally all over him, clearly he was annoyed to the max but I couldn’t but in just yet. I know he can handle himself, but I’m not sure if I can handle what I’m feeling. I lost it when she grabbed his face, I let Jimin’s hand go and stomped over.

I knocked her hand off his face and she stood up “What do you think your doing!”

“Ugh why is your mother here.” Her voice full of sass “Go away grandma, I’m busy.”

“Don’t you dare touch him again!” I got in between them “You and your group have been bothering my boys all night and I’m sick of it. Just like Han said you are all desperate!”

“Really, says the one who was all in Jimin Oppas lap earlier.” She crosses her arms “If that’s not desperate then I don’t know what is.”

“C-Come on Noona!” Hyunjin held my hand “They aren’t worth it. Me and Jimin will gather everyone, go sit in the car yah.”

I took a deep breath and agreed, I told their manager that their leaving and to have the car ready. I went to go sit in Jimin’s car, still fuming. Moments later, Jimin brought Jeongin and Hyunjin to the car. He opened my door and pulled me into a hug.

“She’s right..right?” I whisper

“Right about what?”

“Me being.. d-desperate?”

He pulls away and looks me in the eyes “No, she was mad because you protected your brother.”

“Yeah don’t listen to that she devil.” Hyunjin says from in the car

“Let’s get them home.”

We drive home in silence, everyone waited for us to get out of his car and to our floor. Me and Jimin hug once more before he disappeared into in apartment. They boys and I walked up the stairs, I bid everyone a goodnight and went straight to my room. Flopped on my bed. [Desprate…me? No…never!] my phone pings and it’s Jimin.

MochiBooty❤️: I know your thinking what Tzuyu said but your far from desprate. Your an amazing woman and I’m super happy I’ve gotten to know you. If anything I’m desprate for your attention💕 we should hang out again tomorrow when the boys go to practice, we have the day off. Only if you don’t mind.

MochiBooty❤️: Have a wonder slumber. Goodnight beautiful💕💕💕

[who said he could be this cute!]

Me: I would love to hang out tomorrow! Let’s talk more tomorrow ya…goodnight Minnie💕

I undress into my PJs and slip into a wondrous slumber.

What is your name?
Do you...
body:
BTS (방탄소년단) – The Truth Untold (전하지 못한 진심) (Feat. Steve Aoki)

This garden is filled

With blossoming loneliness

I tied myself

To this sand castle filled with thorns

What is your name?

Do you even have a place to go?

Oh could you tell me?

I saw you hiding in this garden

And I know

Your heat is real

Your hand picks the blue flowers

I want to hold it but

This is my destiny

Don’t smile on me

Light on me

Because I can’t go to you

There’s no name to call

You know that I can’t

Show you me

Give you me

I can’t show you my weakness

So I’m putting on a mask to go see you

But I still want you

A flower that resembles you

Blossomed in this garden of loneliness

I wanted to give it to you

As I take off this stupid mask

But I know

This can’t go on forever

I must hide

Because I’m ugly

I’m afraid

So pathetic

I’m so afraid

In the end, will you leave me too?

So I’m putting on a mask to go see you

What I can do is

To make a pretty flower

That resembles you

Blossom in this garden, in this world

Then breathe as the person you know

But I still want you

I still want you

Maybe back then

If I had just a little more

Courage

And stood before you

Would everything be different now?

I’m crying

At this sandcastle

That’s disappearing

And breaking down

As I look at this broken mask

And I still want you

But I still want you

But I still want you

And I still want you

title: Close to Normal
body:
Chapter 10 - Waking Up

Taehyung x Reader - Fluff/Angst/Smut - 4.6k words

A/N - Hi and happy weekend once again!! So last week I broke 100 followers, I’m so so thankful and happy that that many people are enjoying my writings so far. I’m really not great at Tumblring so I’m honestly very surprised! Thank you for reading as ever, it’s really touching to think of someone reading my story somewhere and being kind enough to leave me a like or a lovely comment, or to reblog it and/or choose to follow the mess that is my blog. Please enjoy this next part, this part has the “smut” in it, and I will never ever claim to be any good at it!!! 

Chapter One ~ Two ~ Three ~ Four ~ Five ~ Six ~ Seven ~ Eight ~ Nine ~ Ten ~ Eleven ~ Twelve ~ Thirteen ~ Fourteen ~ Fifteen ~ Sixteen ~ Seventeen ~ Eighteen ~ Nineteen ~ Twenty ~ Twenty-One ~ Twenty-Two

“When do you have to leave?” You asked the question even though you weren’t sure you wanted to know the answer. Neither of you truly wanted to allow the truth of your situation to seep in to the fantasy land you had created for yourselves of the rooftop that night, but it seemed foolish to wholly deny it for much longer.

“Three days.” A pained expression crossed your face as if you had been punched in the stomach and you could see your sadness reflected in Taehyung’s eyes. “Do you want to know why I’m here?” His question sounded strained, forced, as if he were following cue cards that he wasn’t convinced were for him to read, and you felt apprehension begin to creep up from your stomach.

“Because you wanted to see me?” Your eyes were full of hope, but your tone was playfully flippant, as you tried to skirt around the significance of the question. You knew all too well he wasn’t talking about the reason for his presence at the bar.

He dropped his gaze and shook his head, smiling softly. “Not here,” he clarified, cupping the side of your face with his large hand before sweeping it towards the lit up skyline to clarify. “Here.”

You had suspected there was something unusual about the situation with Taehyung, none of it had really made sense – from the luxurious hotel suite to the bemused man you had met in that same room who had threatened to call the police. You had merely pushed it to the back if your mind, simply grateful for his kindness and his company, before becoming completely entranced by his deep voice and perfect face. By the time it had occurred to you to be curious about the reason for his presence, you were already alone on the roof top of your bar, coming down from the high of your second kiss. “Do you want to tell me?”

“Yes,” he answered instantly but said nothing else, meeting your eyes with an intense gaze once more, and you knew he meant for you to see the sincerity there. “Chinshim.” He drew his knees up to his chest and dropped his forehead to rest on them, letting out a deep groan.

You mirrored his posture, clasping your hands around your shins, only vaguely wondering what the word he had breathed out meant as you stared out to the limited view of the skyline. “Are you in some sort of trouble?” In your periphery you saw him turn his face to you, his expression confused, with his cheek still leaning on his knees. “Like…are you…on the run? From the police or something?” You knew it was an absurd question as soon as the words left your mouth, and you rolled your eyes at yourself before scrunching them shut tightly as if willing the past thirty seconds out of existence.

He lifted his head, his deep brown eyes wide as he took in what you had asked. “On the run…police?” Your eyes remained firmly closed and it felt like an age passed before you heard him breathe in fully before a throaty laugh, higher pitched than you had expected, burst forth from his lips against the silence of the night that surrounded you. “You would be okay with it? Chincha!” he stuttered out between spasms of laughter.

You pouted and nudged him with your shoulder playfully, “No, I just…” You didn’t know what on earth made you ask that, but the need to hazard a guess had been too powerful. However your embarrassment dissipated as soon as you realised how enchanted you were by the sound of his laughter, and you found yourself giggling along with him, such was the contagious nature of the sound, and the tension in the air broken even if just momentarily.

“You like me that much?” he asked, his laughter slowing as he inhaled deeply to stabilise his breathing, and he turned his body slightly to drape his arm around your shoulder once more, pulling you gently to his side and dropping a kiss to the top of your head. You felt his chest expand beneath your fingers and lifted your gaze to look up at him, watching as his mouth opened to speak but no sound followed the movement. You saw him raise his eyes upwards as if searching the stars for the appropriate words. “I’m here for…ah jeongmal.” he let out another laugh, laced with embarrassment and just a little bitterness. He tried once more, “I’m here…”

You lifted your chin, craning your neck so you could meet his eyes, your hand moving to rest against his defined jaw, your thumb stroking just below his cheekbone, stilling his movements. “You’re here.” You repeated, hoping that he understood that that was the only thing that mattered to you right then. His struggle with the words worried you, and you were all of a sudden totally against having him tell you. He met your eyes and unflinchingly stared in to them as if he might find the right words there, their intensity once again knocking the wind from you. You leant upwards a little further to close the gap between your mouths, your eyes fluttering closed as your lips pressed against one another’s in a sweet kiss.

It would have been a lie to say you weren’t curious about his reasons for coming to your part of the world – which until the day before you had been entirely certain that no one outside of the county, let alone the country, would ever bother travelling to – but you didn’t want to ruin the limited time you had together when the subject was clearly so difficult for him to talk about. It would also be dishonest of you to claim that you weren’t a little disappointed that he hadn’t tried to suggest any means of keeping in touch. You pushed that feeling as far away as you could manage, wishing only to savour the moments as they were happening. He would be there for another three days yet, and you had already gotten so close in just over one. There was plenty of time for deciding where this may or may not be heading, right? You opted instead to focus only on the feel of Taehyung’s arms as they tightened around you and his warm lips gently pushing against yours.

A siren sounded once more and you broke away from the kiss, suddenly aware that the night had grown a little colder, and you pulled up the blanket which had fallen back around your shoulders as you nestled again in to his chest, lifting his arm to drag it back around you, to which he chuckled briefly before humming contentedly. “Ah,” you heard him say out of nowhere after a minute or so, and you felt rather than saw him reach for his phone. In the quiet you could hear his fingers tapping against the screen, until you heard soft music begin to play from the small yet effective speakers on his handset.

You each remained motionless but for the gentle stroking of his fingers through your hair and the soothing pattern of your synchronised breaths for the duration of a number of songs, and you felt your eyelids begin to get heavy. You fought against the fatigue that was threatening to overcome you, reluctant to allow sleep steal time from you both, although you knew it would ultimately be a losing battle.

You had been surprised to find that you were familiar with most of the music Taehyung had been playing, and you enjoyed listening to him singing along to parts of each song which he knew best. You noted that his singing voice was startlingly impressive, pleasant even in its hushed, breathy tones. Where he didn’t know the words he hummed along to the melody softly and tapped his free hand against his leg, seemingly swept away entirely in the music.

Finally a song began to play that you did not recognise, and it was the first he had played that was in Korean. It was a beautifully simplistic composition, the subtle plucking and strumming of an acoustic guitar a perfect accompaniment to the lilting melody, and even though you couldn’t understand the meaning of the words – save for the odd English phrase – you found yourself completely moved by it. It was almost like a lullaby, and he knew the lyrics well and sang them confidently, occasionally pulling you tighter to him as he did so, and despite your efforts you felt yourself slipping in to slumber. You were vaguely aware of your body leaning in to his more heavily as sleep finally took you, and just before you could no longer open your eyes, you thought you felt a single drop of warm rain fall on to the bare skin of your hand which still rested on his chest.

~~~

Before he joined you in sleep, he thought about the bullet he had dodged when you had clearly given him an out as far as the truth of his presence was concerned. He had no inkling as to how he should have approached the situation with you. Whenever he opened his mouth to tell you everything, the absurdity of it had hit him, and he was reminded once again of the implausibility of your relationship – if it could even be called such a thing – progressing any further than the time he was here.

He had never uttered the words ‘I’m in an idol group’ before, he never had any need to, as the majority of the time people already knew exactly who he was before he even opened his mouth. He tried to work out if it would be preferable for you to be one of those girls who were more than aware of his identity. It certainly would have made things simpler, not needing to try to articulate the actuality of his circumstances in a way that didn’t sound far-fetched or boastful. Would you even know what an idol group was? He was more than aware that the concept of idols could very well be as foreign to you as his language was.

The fact of the matter was that in all the time he had spent with you, as brief though it may have been in the grand scheme of things, you had made him feel so utterly normal that the truth of his occupation had seemed somewhat preposterous in your presence. The closeness you had been able to cultivate so rapidly, the palpable desire for one another dragging you towards each other almost involuntarily, that was the extraordinary thing he wanted you to dumbfounded by – as he was – not his celebrity status. Not that he believed for a second that you would have been swayed either way by such a factor, he just felt as though the time limit had indubitably passed where it could be dropped in to the conversation in anything resembling a natural fashion.

As your body begin to relax and become heavier against his side, he could feel you trying to jerk yourself awake, succeeding for only a few moments before your head began to droop again, and he smiled as he pressed his lips into the hair at the crown of your head. One of his favourite songs began to play, and he congratulated himself on his playlist selection as he sang along to the lyrics and felt the meaning of the words so strongly it was as if he was hearing them for the first time. He tightened his arm around your shoulders both to keep you warm and to keep you as close to him as possible while he was still able. As the song drew to a close he was surprised to feel hot tears threatening to spill on to his cheeks, and before he could wipe his eyes with his free hand, a single tear rolled down his face and dropped from the sharp line of his jaw.

~~~

He finally woke just as the sun was beginning to rise, just at that point of dawn when the sun’s dim light casts the landscape in an otherworldly glow. Somehow in the night you had both shifted slightly lower, although you were still resting in the crook of his arm, your face turned slightly upwards so he could clearly see your eyelashes resting on your cheeks, your lips slightly parted. The air remained mild, but there was a slight morning chill which had rendered the flesh of your face ice-cold against his skin. Taehyung carefully removed his arm from around your frame, lifting your head gingerly before lowering it on to his folded up coat. He rubbed his palms together to heat his fingers before shuffling down to lie on his side to face you, and raised his hands to press them against your cheeks to warm them, trying not to laugh aloud at the way your face scrunched up at the unexpected contact.

After a few moments, satisfied he had taken the edge away from the cold, he pulled the blankets up to his own chin, then arranged them about your shoulders to keep the warmth in the fleece cocoon he had created for you both. He raised his arm to lean his head against it and found himself amused by the minute changes in your expression as the breeze moved errant strands of hair to tickle against you. He delicately pushed back the offending hair and smiled fondly as you seemed to try and nuzzle your head in to his hand the way a cat might.

He returned his arm to the confines of the blanket and rested his hand lightly just above the dip of your waist and closed his eyes again, his face a picture of contentment as he closed his eyes and wiggled his way down further in to the covers, opening his eyes again – just for a second – almost as if he were checking that you were still there.

The thought suddenly occurred to him that this was the first time he had seen you in daylight, and he was struck with an urge to kiss you as a means of marking the occasion, even if it were only for his benefit. He moved to press a kiss to your forehead, but as he shifted the blankets to bring his body closer to yours, the fleece corner covering your shoulder slipped to the ground. Taehyung’s attention was abruptly pulled to the bare skin the movement had exposed, and any innocent thoughts he may have been entertaining were instantaneously overcome by an intense want. The satin shirt had shifted in sleep, making it appear as though it had been pushed from your shoulders in some passionate embrace.

He was all at once dizzy with the urge to graze his teeth open-mouthed along the curve of your shoulder, to have his tongue swipe briefly against it. He wanted to drag the rest of the shirt down, and he could almost envision his trembling fingers grasping the material to present more to his eyes, his lips, his teeth. A brief image flashed in his mind of his one of his hands curled, gripped around that shoulder, the other placed on the small of your naked back as you arched and moaned his name and –

Your eyes bore in to his. “Taehyung?” You breathed out his name as a question and he could only imagine what he must look like to you. He could feel his mouth was agape as his eyes fixated on your bare skin and dishevelled clothes, and he averted his gaze from you swiftly, suddenly bashful.

“I…sorry… ” Still unable to meet your eyes he reached towards you without looking and attempted to adjust the shirt so it covered you again and buried his face in to his arm, groaning in embarrassment.

“Taehyung,” you repeated. He could hear you were closer and he opened his eyes to find you leaning over him, your eyes roaming over his face as though you were trying to commit it to memory.

He watched entranced as you lowered your face to his, pausing briefly as your lips were mere centimetres apart, flicking your eyes upwards to meet his gaze, before closing the distance and pressing your lips together, waves of arousal coursing through his veins like electric currents at the contact. He let you take the lead, still wary that you had caught him brazenly gawking at you and reluctant to approach any lines that you weren’t ready to cross.

Any concern he may have had about your willingness to progress things further were quickly assuaged as you grabbed the collar of his t-shirt and pulled him forcefully in to a seated position, continuing to kiss him passionately as you did so, gripping his face between your hands as you took his bottom lip between yours and sucked lightly, swinging one of your legs over both of his and seating yourself over his thighs.

You broke away from the kiss abruptly, and Taehyung found himself chasing your lips with his own as you sat back on your haunches, meeting his eyes again fiercely as you slipped the satin shirt from your shoulders. As you discarded the garment behind you, he stared – awestruck – as you reached slowly towards the strap on your left shoulder and hooked your thumb beneath it, dragging the thin material down and biting gently down on your bottom lip.

Whatever restraint Taehyung was held back by finally snapped, and he lurched forward to crush his chest against yours, stretching upwards to meet your lips, kissing you harder than he had before, muffled grunts spilling forth from his throat against your mouth. A soft whimper escaped you as you gripped his biceps to steady yourself, and he placed his hands on the strip of flesh between your vest and your pyjama bottoms to hold you tighter against his body, feeling goosebumps rise beneath the pads of his fingers. He spread his long digits outwards and upwards so they rested slightly beneath the material of your top, his tongue running along the seam of your lips which you parted instantly to allow him to deepen the kiss further.

Keeping one hand on your back, he moved the other to your ribcage and ran his thumb along the underside of your breast. He broke the kiss to meet your eyes. “Okay?” he was out of breath and almost out of his mind with desire but your arousal was glaringly obvious to him, and as you ground down mindlessly in to his lap he inhaled in a hiss at the friction.

“Please.” Your response left you in a breathy moan and Taehyung needed no further encouragement to progress.

It would have been a lie to say you weren’t curious about his reasons for coming to your part of the world – which until the day before you had been entirely certain that no one outside of the county, let alone the country, would ever bother travelling to – but you didn’t want to ruin the limited time you had together when the subject was clearly so difficult for him to talk about. It would also be dishonest of you to claim that you weren’t a little disappointed that he hadn’t tried to suggest any means of keeping in touch. You pushed that feeling as far away as you could manage, wishing only to savour the moments as they were happening. He would be there for another three days yet, and you had already gotten so close in just over one. There was plenty of time for deciding where this may or may not be heading, right? You opted instead to focus only on the feel of Taehyung’s arms as they tightened around you and his warm lips gently pushing against yours.

A siren sounded once more and you broke away from the kiss, suddenly aware that the night had grown a little colder, and you pulled up the blanket which had fallen back around your shoulders as you nestled again in to his chest, lifting his arm to drag it back around you, to which he chuckled briefly before humming contentedly. “Ah,” you heard him say out of nowhere after a minute or so, and you felt rather than saw him reach for his phone. In the quiet you could hear his fingers tapping against the screen, until you heard soft music begin to play from the small yet effective speakers on his handset.

You each remained motionless but for the gentle stroking of his fingers through your hair and the soothing pattern of your synchronised breaths for the duration of a number of songs, and you felt your eyelids begin to get heavy. You fought against the fatigue that was threatening to overcome you, reluctant to allow sleep steal time from you both, although you knew it would ultimately be a losing battle.

You had been surprised to find that you were familiar with most of the music Taehyung had been playing, and you enjoyed listening to him singing along to parts of each song which he knew best. You noted that his singing voice was startlingly impressive, pleasant even in its hushed, breathy tones. Where he didn’t know the words he hummed along to the melody softly and tapped his free hand against his leg, seemingly swept away entirely in the music.

Finally a song began to play that you did not recognise, and it was the first he had played that was in Korean. It was a beautifully simplistic composition, the subtle plucking and strumming of an acoustic guitar a perfect accompaniment to the lilting melody, and even though you couldn’t understand the meaning of the words – save for the odd English phrase – you found yourself completely moved by it. It was almost like a lullaby, and he knew the lyrics well and sang them confidently, occasionally pulling you tighter to him as he did so, and despite your efforts you felt yourself slipping in to slumber. You were vaguely aware of your body leaning in to his more heavily as sleep finally took you, and just before you could no longer open your eyes, you thought you felt a single drop of warm rain fall on to the bare skin of your hand which still rested on his chest.

~~~

Before he joined you in sleep, he thought about the bullet he had dodged when you had clearly given him an out as far as the truth of his presence was concerned. He had no inkling as to how he should have approached the situation with you. Whenever he opened his mouth to tell you everything, the absurdity of it had hit him, and he was reminded once again of the implausibility of your relationship – if it could even be called such a thing – progressing any further than the time he was here.

He had never uttered the words ‘I’m in an idol group’ before, he never had any need to, as the majority of the time people already knew exactly who he was before he even opened his mouth. He tried to work out if it would be preferable for you to be one of those girls who were more than aware of his identity. It certainly would have made things simpler, not needing to try to articulate the actuality of his circumstances in a way that didn’t sound far-fetched or boastful. Would you even know what an idol group was? He was more than aware that the concept of idols could very well be as foreign to you as his language was.

The fact of the matter was that in all the time he had spent with you, as brief though it may have been in the grand scheme of things, you had made him feel so utterly normal that the truth of his occupation had seemed somewhat preposterous in your presence. The closeness you had been able to cultivate so rapidly, the palpable desire for one another dragging you towards each other almost involuntarily, that was the extraordinary thing he wanted you to dumbfounded by – as he was – not his celebrity status. Not that he believed for a second that you would have been swayed either way by such a factor, he just felt as though the time limit had indubitably passed where it could be dropped in to the conversation in anything resembling a natural fashion.

As your body begin to relax and become heavier against his side, he could feel you trying to jerk yourself awake, succeeding for only a few moments before your head began to droop again, and he smiled as he pressed his lips into the hair at the crown of your head. One of his favourite songs began to play, and he congratulated himself on his playlist selection as he sang along to the lyrics and felt the meaning of the words so strongly it was as if he was hearing them for the first time. He tightened his arm around your shoulders both to keep you warm and to keep you as close to him as possible while he was still able. As the song drew to a close he was surprised to feel hot tears threatening to spill on to his cheeks, and before he could wipe his eyes with his free hand, a single tear rolled down his face and dropped from the sharp line of his jaw.

~~~

He finally woke just as the sun was beginning to rise, just at that point of dawn when the sun’s dim light casts the landscape in an otherworldly glow. Somehow in the night you had both shifted slightly lower, although you were still resting in the crook of his arm, your face turned slightly upwards so he could clearly see your eyelashes resting on your cheeks, your lips slightly parted. The air remained mild, but there was a slight morning chill which had rendered the flesh of your face ice-cold against his skin. Taehyung carefully removed his arm from around your frame, lifting your head gingerly before lowering it on to his folded up coat. He rubbed his palms together to heat his fingers before shuffling down to lie on his side to face you, and raised his hands to press them against your cheeks to warm them, trying not to laugh aloud at the way your face scrunched up at the unexpected contact.

After a few moments, satisfied he had taken the edge away from the cold, he pulled the blankets up to his own chin, then arranged them about your shoulders to keep the warmth in the fleece cocoon he had created for you both. He raised his arm to lean his head against it and found himself amused by the minute changes in your expression as the breeze moved errant strands of hair to tickle against you. He delicately pushed back the offending hair and smiled fondly as you seemed to try and nuzzle your head in to his hand the way a cat might.

He returned his arm to the confines of the blanket and rested his hand lightly just above the dip of your waist and closed his eyes again, his face a picture of contentment as he closed his eyes and wiggled his way down further in to the covers, opening his eyes again – just for a second – almost as if he were checking that you were still there.

The thought suddenly occurred to him that this was the first time he had seen you in daylight, and he was struck with an urge to kiss you as a means of marking the occasion, even if it were only for his benefit. He moved to press a kiss to your forehead, but as he shifted the blankets to bring his body closer to yours, the fleece corner covering your shoulder slipped to the ground. “When do you have to leave?” You asked the question even though you weren’t sure you wanted to know the answer. Neither of you truly wanted to allow the truth of your situation to seep in to the fantasy land you had created for yourselves of the rooftop that night, but it seemed foolish to wholly deny it for much longer.

“Three days.” A pained expression crossed your face as if you had been punched in the stomach and you could see your sadness reflected in Taehyung’s eyes. “Do you want to know why I’m here?” His question sounded strained, forced, as if he were following cue cards that he wasn’t convinced were for him to read, and you felt apprehension begin to creep up from your stomach.

“Because you wanted to see me?” Your eyes were full of hope, but your tone was playfully flippant, as you tried to skirt around the significance of the question. You knew all too well he wasn’t talking about the reason for his presence at the bar.

He dropped his gaze and shook his head, smiling softly. “Not here,” he clarified, cupping the side of your face with his large hand before sweeping it towards the lit up skyline to clarify. “Here.”

You had suspected there was something unusual about the situation with Taehyung, none of it had really made sense – from the luxurious hotel suite to the bemused man you had met in that same room who had threatened to call the police. You had merely pushed it to the back if your mind, simply grateful for his kindness and his company, before becoming completely entranced by his deep voice and perfect face. By the time it had occurred to you to be curious about the reason for his presence, you were already alone on the roof top of your bar, coming down from the high of your second kiss. “Do you want to tell me?”

“Yes,” he answered instantly but said nothing else, meeting your eyes with an intense gaze once more, and you knew he meant for you to see the sincerity there. “Chinshim.” He drew his knees up to his chest and dropped his forehead to rest on them, letting out a deep groan.
